alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 13 at 11:27PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory is in effect through 8 AM Wednesday... * Breezy and gusty winds of 25 mph to 35 mph with higher gusts will impact all islands of American Samoa this morning. * TIMING...Until 8 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1124 PO ASO LUA IUNI 13 2023 ...UA IAI NEI LE FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI SEIA OO I LE 8 AM ASO LULU... * O savili malolosi ma le agi faata`uta`u e 25 i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o le a aafia ai motu uma o Amerika Samoa i le taeao nei. * TAIMI...Seia oo atu i le 8 AM ASO LULU. *AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA...O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e 29 i le 38 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u i le 40 mph, o le a taunuu mai i luga o le atunuu, ae maise lava nofoaga maualuluga. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
